::Cygnar::
    "I have just the bot to stay here and help with that.  NeoGuile, step 
forward."  

::NeoGuile::
    He steps forward silently.  "I understand.  I will work here."

::Cygnar::
    "Good.  Now, I suggest you find Drill Bit now Apocalypse.  It would be a 
mistake to attempt blasting our way in.  Too many casualties are created that 
way."
